nodes.text: Kaya was a Human female smuggler operating during the Galactic War. In 3637 BBY, she was part of a crew that made a run to the planet Rakata Prime, and was the only survivor after they were attacked by the native Rakata. Fleeing from a Revanite fleet, she and her droid D0-M9 headed to Raider's Cove on Rishi.
